quick_description: Sitecues zoom and speech makes the web easier to see, hear and use.
slider_instructions: Try using the zoom slider to magnify this web page.
blurb_reset_done: Sitecues zoom & speech features are now turned off.
blurb_can_hide: You can also hide the Sitecues toolbar on this web page.
restore_via_f8_part2: at any time to get Sitecues back.
